name: Piano White Little - Mini Game
description:
Piano White Little is a classic version of piano games which has many mini games.

Have you ever dreamed of becoming a professional pianist like Beethoven, Chopin or Mozart? Have you ever dreamed of playing classic songs like fur Elise, Little Star,Cannon? Here is the Piano White Little.

In this game, you can play piano with classic play: tap black tiles with music rhythm and do not tap white tiles. You can enjoy different classic piano songs from professional pianist like Beethoven, Chopin or Mozart.All little games for free in one app!

All these little games are very easy but addictive. The only thing you need to do is just Tap. Tap to start , tap to have fun. Pick up your favorite songs, little star, fur Elise, Cannon etc.

Piano White Little Highlights:
- More than 15 mini games, and we are working hard to add more.
- More than 35 piano melody songs , and we are adding more classic pop songs
- Easy and fun to play, challenging to master
- Level up system to unlock more items
- Challenge users all over the world

Piano White Little Game Features:
- Piano go mode : play with different classic piano songs
- Arcade mode : try your best to tap the black tiles as many as you can, and do not miss one
- Classic mode : tap black tiles as quickly as you can
- Relay mode : tap 50 black tiles in 10 seconds.
- Stick Hero mode : stretch the stick to perfect length
- Rush mode : dash to the sky as high as you can
- AA Pin mode : pin more needles as more as you can
- Orbits mode : pass through the circles as more as you can
- Move mode : avoid balls as more as you can
- Shoot moon mode: shoot moon with rocket
- Fun Stair mode: climb the stair as long as you can
- Pyramid mode: stack the pyramid to high
- Rotate mode: pick up the different color dots
- 10 X 10 mode: put blocks in 10 X 10 boards with piano melody

We will keep adding more addictive mini games in Piano White Little. It is always for free. If you have any suggestions, please let us know. Come to download this addictive app!
